thread.title: A quaint and extremely clean hotel
thread.title_full: A quaint and extremely clean hotel - Review of Hotel Jardins d'Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Tina A
title: A quaint and extremely clean hotel
text:
We stayed there for a few days with my husband. The staff was very friendly. The room was very small, but we were in Europe after all and sizes are a bit different than in the US. The room was at a very reasonable price, given the excellent location and the cleanness (I looked even behind the toilet- not a spec of dust anywhere). We had a view of the Tower, we would keep the window open for a while and it was pretty quiet, the room was overlooking the court. We loved the neighborhood- young crowd, trendy restaurants near by (Les Cocottes- a must), walking distance to the Eiffel Tower, metro station. We loved our stay!
Room Tip: rooms overlooking the court yard are quiet, view of Eiffel Tower is Great See more room tips
